title: Signs of the End Times
summary: Jesus foretells the destruction of the temple and describes future tribulations, false messiahs, and His eventual return. He urges His followers to stay watchful and faithful until the end.

faq.question: What is a key message in Mark 13?
faq.answer: It emphasizes the servant nature of Jesus and the power of faith in action.

faq.question: What does Mark 13 reveal about Jesus?
faq.answer: It shows His authority, compassion, and call to follow Him wholeheartedly.
